schema.name: 2018/11/08 Dinner Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cabbage and carrots thoroughly under cold water.
Thinly slice the cabbage and grate the carrots, then combine in a large salad bowl.
In a small bowl, mix together Greek yogurt, minced garlic, coco sugar, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Pour the yogurt dressing over the cabbage and carrot mixture. Toss until all ingredients are well coated with the dressing.

schema.description: Delight in the fresh, high-fiber essence of our 2018/11/08 Dinner Salad. A harmonious blend of raw cabbage and carrots, seasoned with a twist of salt, pepper, and a hint of coco sugar. Infused with the creamy richness of Greek yogurt and the pungent kick of raw garlic, this salad is a testament to healthy, yet scrumptious dining. Perfect for anyone on a quest for Healthy Recipes that do not compromise on flavor, this Healthified salad will invigorate your meal with its nutritious goodness.
